applicant-name.name: JIANGSU LEISHUO ELECTRONIC MAT CO LTD
江苏雷硕电子材料有限公司

invention-title: Electronic-grade hydrogen peroxide production process through double-concentration hydrogen peroxide
一种通过双浓度双氧水的电子级双氧水生产工艺

abstract.p: The invention provides an electronic-grade hydrogen peroxide production process using double-concentration hydrogen peroxide, the electronic-grade hydrogen peroxide production process uses industrial hydrogen peroxide production, and the electronic-grade hydrogen peroxide production process comprises a double-path rough filtration assembly, a blending tank, a reverse osmosis device, a fine filtration combination tank field, a pure water pipe and a concentrated water pipe, the two-way rough filtration assemblies are two sets of rough filtration assemblies which are arranged in parallel, a raw material temporary storage tank and a rough filter are arranged in each of the two-way rough filtration assemblies, the two-way rough filtration assemblies are connected with a 27.5% industrial grade hydrogen peroxide pipeline and a 50% industrial grade hydrogen peroxide pipeline respectively, and the process adopts the processes of fixed-ratio blending, two-stage ultra-fine filtration, low-temperature operation and the like; the whole process flow is short, the equipment investment is small, and the continuous production period is long; product grades are diversified, and no wastewater is discharged theoretically; the capacity operation flexibility is high, the energy consumption is relatively stable, and the fluctuation of market requirements can be adapted.

本文提出了一种通过双浓度双氧水的电子级双氧水生产工艺，电子级双氧水生产工艺通过工业双氧水生产，所述的电子级双氧水生产工艺包括双路粗滤组件、调配罐、反渗透装置、精滤组合罐区、纯水管和浓水管，所述的双路粗滤组件为平行设置的两组粗滤组件，双路粗滤组件内均设有原料暂储罐和粗滤器，双路粗滤组件分别与27.5％工业级双氧水管路和50％工业级双氧水管路相连，工艺采用定比调配、两级超精滤、低温操作等流程；整个工艺流程简短，设备投资小，连续性生产周期长；产品等级多样化，理论上无废水排放；产能操作弹性大，能耗相对稳定，能够适应市场需求的波动。
